_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The aspects of mindfulness meditation [s: Observing an aspect of the body
The development of mindfulness meditatio: Observing the body as liable to originate, as liable to vanish, and as liable to originate and vanish
Observing feelings as liable to originate, as liable to vanish, and as liable to originate and vanish
Observing mind as liable to originate, as liable to vanish, and as liable to originate and vanish
Observing principles as liable to originate, as liable to vanish, and as liable to originate and vanish
